content.text: Multiple plugins within the ElizaOS ecosystem have been updated to include Biome linting and formatting configurations. This includes plugins related to Solana, blockchain, storage, TEE, and more. The updates involve adding @biomejs/biome as a devDependency, adding lint and format scripts, and standardizing dependencies.

Documentation updates have been made to reflect changes in branding and to improve clarity. This includes renaming Twitter to X (Twitter) in the README file and adding weekly contributor meeting notes. Additionally, typos and consistency issues in community chat logs have been corrected.

New features have been added to the ElizaOS plugins, including the TON Plugin for NFT and wallet management, and the Cookie.fun plugin for social sentiment analysis. The DeFAI Protocol has also been integrated to enable AI-driven DeFi interactions.

Various bug fixes and optimizations have been implemented across different plugins and components of ElizaOS. This includes fixing ESM import issues, optimizing the quick-intel plugin, and improving Slack client attachment handling.

categories.title: Issues and Updates in ElizaOS GitHub Repository

content.text: The README file has been updated to reflect Twitter's rebranding to X. The term 'X (Twitter)' is now used to accommodate users still familiar with the old name.

There are build errors when deploying on render.com, specifically related to the 'sharp' package. Errors include 'NewOrCopy' not being a member of 'Napi::Buffer<char>'. Attempts to make 'sharp' optional did not resolve the issue.

A feature request has been made to enhance code standards by implementing consistent coding practices. This includes naming conventions, consistent formatting, and using tools like ESLint and Prettier.
A runtime import error occurs in NestJs applications using packages from the Eliza repository. The error 'ERR_PACKAGE_PATH_NOT_EXPORTED' suggests issues with package exports in the Eliza packages.
A Twitter agent is experiencing an 'ERR_INVALID_URL' error when generating new tweets. Attempts to use different LLM APIs have not resolved the issue.

A Twitter logging bug is reported where, despite successful login, errors occur when fetching or posting tweets. No login notification is received on the user's phone, indicating potential authentication issues.

The cryptocurrency market is experiencing significant activity with notable changes in the prices and market caps of major digital assets. Bitcoin, the leading cryptocurrency, is currently priced at $101,115 with a 24-hour trading volume of $112,871,280,620 and a market cap of $2,001,568,294,896. It has seen a substantial daily change of 6050%.
Ethereum, another major player in the crypto space, is priced at $2,848.58. It has a 24-hour trading volume of $94,569,554,776 and a market cap of $343,033,681,380, with a daily change of 61.282%.
Solana is currently valued at $217.03, with a 24-hour trading volume of $15,668,062,762 and a market cap of $105,684,123,753. It has experienced a daily change of 23.339436%.
The token ai16z is priced at $0.4334, with a 24-hour trading volume of $27,350,547.08 and a market cap of $476,779,804. It has seen a daily change of 11.65%.

categories.title: Recent Twitter Activity on DAOs and Creative Projects

content.text: No delay on DAOs.fun as announced by partnersDAO.
User expresses feeling tired with a humorous tone.

Curious about @partnersDAO's long-term goals? Check out this clip from DAOVOS #2 made by @_mackinac. Due to the hype around DAOVOS, we will start hosting three events per week. Set a reminder for DAOVOS #4.
Set a reminder for DAOVOS #4 featuring @pawgDAO and @PRINT3Rxyz.
Evgeny Gaevoy reflects on his enjoyable experience on Twitter over the past few years, highlighting the development of his unique posting style.
Marc Gopher emphasizes the importance of following the money, suggesting it as a fundamental principle.

categories.title: Recent Developments in Solana Ecosystem and Community Discussions

content.text: Development efforts are focused on package improvements, including adding Biome configuration to Solana ecosystem plugins. New features such as NFT collection and item creation, metadata change, and transfer actions are being introduced in the TON Plugin. The project saw contributions from 24 contributors, merging 15 PRs, and addressing 7 bug fixes.

PartnersDAO is actively engaging the community with events like DAOVOS, planning to increase the frequency to three times a week due to high interest. Upcoming DAOVOS #4 will feature @pawgDAO and @PRINT3Rxyz.

Shawmakesmagic shares various thoughts and ideas on Twitter, including a humorous take on government insider trading, a suggestion for an agent to report scams, and a positive opinion on the OpenAI model o3.
A meme and a video shared by shawmakesmagic reflect on personal thoughts and humor.
A commentary on the financial success of non-profit leaders in the homelessness sector and a reminder to follow the money in financial matters.
